# shoehorn_integrations (Data Source)

Retrieves the status of all system integrations (authentication, GitHub, org data).

## Example Usage

```terraform
# List all system integrations
data "shoehorn_integrations" "all" {}

output "integration_total" {
  value = data.shoehorn_integrations.all.total
}

output "integration_healthy" {
  value = data.shoehorn_integrations.all.healthy
}

output "connected_integrations" {
  value = [for i in data.shoehorn_integrations.all.integrations : {
    type     = i.type
    provider = i.provider
  } if i.status == "connected"]
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Read-Only

- `healthy` (Number) Number of healthy integrations.
- `integrations` (Attributes List) The list of system integrations. (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--integrations))
- `total` (Number) Total number of integrations.

<a id="nestedatt--integrations"></a>
### Nested Schema for `integrations`

Read-Only:

- `config` (String) The integration configuration as JSON.
- `metadata` (String) The integration metadata as JSON.
- `provider` (String) The integration provider (github, zitadel, etc.).
- `status` (String) The integration status (connected, disconnected, error).
- `type` (String) The integration type (github, authentication, orgdata).
